name: In The Dark (itch) (PavelMishin, miri_terra)
description:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I N S T R U C T I O N  !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

- To play you need to have a camera on your device and to give permission in browser to it. Also, you can play with mobile device (tested only on android).

- Play with enabled sound - the game has no interface, the only way to detect danger is to listen.

 - When you feel the danger you should turn off the light. In your room. Yes, in this reality. When the danger is gone, turn it back on.

- Start with the light turned on.
